title: Farrukh grieved over martyrdom of Pakistani peacekeepers in Congo helicopter crash
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 29 (APP):The State Minister for Information and Broadcasting  Farrukh Habib on Tuesday grieved over the martyrdom of Pakistan Armyâ€™s officers and soldiers, serving under the United Nations Peacekeeping Mission, during a helicopter crash in Congo.
In a tweet, he prayed to the Almighty to rest the departed souls in the highest ranks of Jannah.
Farrukh said  Pakistan Army soldiers were playing an important role in the UN peacekeeping mission.
The minister said, the sacrifices rendered by Pakistani soldiers for the world peace were unforgettable. They were our heroes, he added.
